ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.singletons

Class SelectedItemsSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.singletons.SelectedItemsSingleton

  • public class SelectedItemsSingleton
extends Object
    A singleton to pass the currently selected claim and expense between activities

      • getSelectedItemsSingleton

        public static SelectedItemsSingleton getSelectedItemsSingleton()
        Returns the item runtime object associated with the current Android application. Most of the methods of class Runtime are instance methods and must be invoked with respect to the current runtime object.
        Returns:
        the selectedItemsSingleton object associated user's claims and expenses.
